# Git Command Reference {#sec-appendix-git}

This appendix provides a comprehensive reference for Git commands and workflows.

## Setup and Configuration {#sec-git-setup}

| Command | Description | Example |
|:--------|:------------|:--------|
| `git config --global user.name` | Set username | `git config --global user.name "Your Name"` |
| `git config --global user.email` | Set email | `git config --global user.email "you@example.com"` |
| `git config --global init.defaultBranch` | Set default branch | `git config --global init.defaultBranch main` |
| `git config --global core.editor` | Set default editor | `git config --global core.editor "vim"` |
| `git config --list` | Show all settings | `git config --list` |
| `git config --global --list` | Show global settings | `git config --global --list` |
| `git config --local --list` | Show local settings | `git config --local --list` |
| `git config --global alias.st` | Create alias | `git config --global alias.st status` |

: Git configuration commands {#tbl-git-config}

## Repository Operations {#sec-git-repo}

| Command | Description | Example |
|:--------|:------------|:--------|
| `git init` | Initialize new repository | `git init` |
| `git init --bare` | Initialize bare repository | `git init --bare` |
| `git clone` | Clone remote repository | `git clone URL` |
| `git clone --depth 1` | Shallow clone (latest only) | `git clone --depth 1 URL` |
| `git clone -b branch` | Clone specific branch | `git clone -b develop URL` |

: Repository operations {#tbl-git-repo}

## Checking Status {#sec-git-status}

| Command | Description | Example |
|:--------|:------------|:--------|
| `git status` | Show working tree status | `git status` |
| `git status -s` | Short format status | `git status -s` |
| `git log` | View commit history | `git log` |
| `git log --oneline` | Condensed history | `git log --oneline` |
| `git log --graph` | Show branch graph | `git log --oneline --graph` |
| `git log -n 5` | Show last n commits | `git log -n 5` |
| `git log --author` | Filter by author | `git log --author="name"` |
| `git log --since` | Filter by date | `git log --since="2024-01-01"` |
| `git log -p` | Show patches (diffs) | `git log -p` |
| `git log --stat` | Show change statistics | `git log --stat` |
| `git log -- file` | History for specific file | `git log -- path/to/file` |
| `git show` | Show commit details | `git show abc1234` |
| `git blame` | Show who changed each line | `git blame file.txt` |

: Status and history commands {#tbl-git-status}

## Making Changes {#sec-git-changes}

| Command | Description | Example |
|:--------|:------------|:--------|
| `git add file` | Stage specific file | `git add file.txt` |
| `git add .` | Stage all changes | `git add .` |
| `git add -A` | Stage all (including deletions) | `git add -A` |
| `git add -p` | Interactive staging | `git add -p` |
| `git commit -m` | Commit with message | `git commit -m "Add feature"` |
| `git commit -a` | Stage and commit tracked files | `git commit -am "Update"` |
| `git commit --amend` | Modify last commit | `git commit --amend` |
| `git commit --amend -m` | Change last commit message | `git commit --amend -m "New message"` |
| `git reset HEAD file` | Unstage file | `git reset HEAD file.txt` |
| `git checkout -- file` | Discard changes | `git checkout -- file.txt` |
| `git restore file` | Discard changes (new syntax) | `git restore file.txt` |
| `git restore --staged file` | Unstage file (new syntax) | `git restore --staged file.txt` |
| `git rm file` | Remove file from Git | `git rm file.txt` |
| `git rm --cached file` | Untrack file (keep locally) | `git rm --cached secret.txt` |
| `git mv old new` | Rename/move file | `git mv old.txt new.txt` |

: Making changes {#tbl-git-changes}

## Viewing Differences {#sec-git-diff}

| Command | Description | Example |
|:--------|:------------|:--------|
| `git diff` | Show unstaged changes | `git diff` |
| `git diff --staged` | Show staged changes | `git diff --staged` |
| `git diff --cached` | Same as --staged | `git diff --cached` |
| `git diff HEAD` | Show all uncommitted changes | `git diff HEAD` |
| `git diff commit1 commit2` | Compare commits | `git diff abc123 def456` |
| `git diff branch1 branch2` | Compare branches | `git diff main feature` |
| `git diff --stat` | Summary of changes | `git diff --stat` |
| `git diff --name-only` | Changed files only | `git diff --name-only` |

: Viewing differences {#tbl-git-diff}

| Command | Description | Example |
|:--------|:------------|:--------|
| `git branch` | List local branches | `git branch` |
| `git branch -a` | List all branches | `git branch -a` |
| `git branch -r` | List remote branches | `git branch -r` |
| `git branch name` | Create new branch | `git branch feature-x` |
| `git checkout name` | Switch to branch | `git checkout feature-x` |
| `git checkout -b name` | Create and switch | `git checkout -b feature-x` |
| `git switch name` | Switch branch (new syntax) | `git switch feature-x` |
| `git switch -c name` | Create and switch (new syntax) | `git switch -c feature-x` |
| `git branch -d name` | Delete merged branch | `git branch -d feature-x` |
| `git branch -D name` | Force delete branch | `git branch -D feature-x` |
| `git branch -m old new` | Rename branch | `git branch -m old-name new-name` |

## Remote Operations {#sec-git-remote}

| Command | Description | Example |
|:--------|:------------|:--------|

| `git remote -v` | List remotes with URLs | `git remote -v` |

| `git fetch --all` | Fetch all remotes | `git fetch --all` |
| `git pull` | Fetch and merge | `git pull origin main` |
| `git pull --rebase` | Fetch and rebase | `git pull --rebase origin main` |
| `git push` | Upload to remote | `git push origin main` |
| `git push -u` | Push and set upstream | `git push -u origin main` |
| `git push --force` | Force push (caution!) | `git push --force origin branch` |
| `git push --tags` | Push all tags | `git push --tags` |
| `git push origin --delete` | Delete remote branch | `git push origin --delete feature-x` |

## Undoing Changes {#sec-git-undo}

| Command | Description | Example |
|:--------|:------------|:--------|
| `git reset --soft HEAD~1` | Undo commit, keep staged | `git reset --soft HEAD~1` |
| `git reset HEAD~1` | Undo commit, unstage | `git reset HEAD~1` |
| `git reset --hard HEAD~1` | Undo commit, discard changes | `git reset --hard HEAD~1` |
| `git reset --hard origin/main` | Reset to remote state | `git reset --hard origin/main` |
| `git revert commit` | Create undo commit | `git revert abc1234` |
| `git checkout commit -- file` | Restore file from commit | `git checkout abc123 -- file.txt` |
| `git reflog` | Show reference log | `git reflog` |

## Useful Aliases {#sec-git-aliases}

Add these to your `~/.gitconfig` for convenience:

```bash
[alias]
    st = status
    co = checkout
    br = branch
    ci = commit
    lg = log --oneline --graph --decorate
    last = log -1 HEAD
    unstage = reset HEAD --
    visual = !gitk
    aliases = config --get-regexp alias
```

## .gitignore Patterns {#sec-gitignore}

| Pattern | Description |
|:--------|:------------|
| `*.log` | All .log files |
| `!important.log` | Exception (don't ignore) |
| `/TODO` | Only root TODO |
| `build/` | Directory named build |
| `doc/*.txt` | .txt in doc only |
| `doc/**/*.pdf` | .pdf in doc and subdirs |
| `**/logs` | logs directory anywhere |

: .gitignore patterns {#tbl-gitignore}
